description:
From this course, you will learn how to start and run a successful real estate appraisal business. This includes the information you need to know in order structure, name and brand your business. You will learn how to procure new quality clients and this is particularly geared towards the Appraisal Management Companies (AMCs). Most importantly you will learn how to earn a lot of money the most efficient way possible and how to manage those earnings. This course also includes some tangible bonus materials that I think be a great benefit to you. No anecdotes. No fluff stuff. Just step-by-step, content rich information.

Course Contents:
- Business Structure
- Branding Your Business
- Best New Appraiser Tools
- Setting Your Fees
- Building a Better Client Base with AMCs
- Phone Etiquette
- Efficiency and Outsourcing
- Accounting
- Better Business Practices
- Networking and Marketing


BONUS MATERIALS!
- Appraisal Log and Accounting Workbook (Microsoft Excel)
- Income Calculator / Fee Calculation Worksheet
- Field Inspection Sheet
- Appraisal Management Company List with over 100 AMCs
- The Brinton Appraisals APPROVED AMC list - who pays and who stays!

www.brintonappraisalclasses.com
title: The Big Business Appraiser
